title: Battlestar Galactica Face Of The Enemy Fanedit v5 BluRay 1080p
description:
Battlestar.Galactica.The.Face.Of.The.Enemy.Complete.Fanedit.v5.BluRay.1080p.2ch.mkv

NEW 1080i SOURCE FROM JAPANESE BLU-RAYS >> SPECIAL THANKS TO SOURCE POSTER

THIS IS THE SAME CONTENT AS VERSION4 WITH BETTER VIDEO AND AUDIO QUALITY

VIEW BETWEEN s04e11 Sometimes a Great Notion and s04e12 A Disquiet Follows My Soul

Battlestar Galactica The Face of the Enemy integrated fanedit using 1080i Blu-Ray source
version5 33min53sec Handbrake0.9.9 685,661,919bytes
V: 1904x1064p 2-Pass Encoding (Turbo first pass) Preset=10(placebo) 2500Kbps AVC
A: 2.0 160Kbps AAC
IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1338724/

The story is powerful, both Gaeta (Alessandro Juliani) and Sweet Eight (Grace Park) do great jobs and we finally find out what Baltar whispered into Gaeta's ear in the brig that made him attack Baltar. This is best viewed in between s4e11 and s4e12. Since the parts are all strung together some unneeded establishing shots were cut as were some overlapping clips.

This is the fifth (and final?) edit and encode of Battlestar Galactica's The Face of the Enemy 10 webisode series. This new version5 used the very best source: the newly available Japanese Battlestar Galactica Season 4 Blu-ray Box Set and compared to previous fanedits was encoded at a higher bitrate using the placebo profile.

SPECIAL THANKS: a very, very special thanks to the poster of this Blu-Ray source. Thank you!!!

v5 improvements over v4:
* New 1080i 14.22Mbps AVC video, stereo 640Kbps AC3 audio source from Japanese Battlestar Galactica Season 4 Blu-ray Box Set
* final video encode was 2500Kbps, 2-pass, placebo
* resolution is better than the previous 720p low bit-rate streaming source
* colors are much better than the previous source

Technical notes:
The source was high bitrate 1080i AVC Blu-Ray video which looks great compared to the older 720p web streaming source.

The top, left and right edges had tiny black bars and the bottom edge had a very noticeable partial black bar: no black bar for the left few hundred pixels then a black bar for the rest of the bottom edge. In the process of trimming the black bars and maintaining the aspect ratio a final resolution of 1904x1064 was produced.

Source:
video: AVC, 14513-14626Kbps, 1920x1080i (16:9), 29.970fps
audio: AC3, 640Kbps, 48.0KHz, 2 channels

FFmpeg 64-bit built 2015.01.15: convert Source files to Editing files, video re-encoded, audio passthrough

Editing:
video: MPEG-2V, 20816-20845Kbps, 1920x1080p (16:9), 29.970fps
audio: AC3, 640Kbps, 48.0KHz, 2 channels

Editing Output: convert clips on 4 timelines to single file, video passthrough, audio re-encoded
video: MPEG-2V, 19757Kbps, 1920x1080p (16:9), 29.970fps
audio: AC3, 384Kbps, 48.0KHz, 2 channels

Handbrake 0.9.9: convert Editing Output to Final Output, video/audio re-encoded
